title: On Santa's Naughty List
description: These girls don't need coal in their stockings to set their red-hot lovers on fire....LACEY ALEXANDERUnwrappedEmily clams up when irresistible Simon mentions anything naughtier than the missionary position, until a college-friend-turned-sex-therapist offers some tantalizingly unconventional erotic instruction...just in time for the holidays.SHELBY REEDHoliday InnWhen a freak snowstorm strands Anna and gorgeous, leather-clad biker Jesse together on Christmas Eve, the strangers turn a little of Santa's magic into an unforgettable night of passion.MELANI BLAZERWhen I Close My EyesSnowed into her vacation cabin, Kenna and Seth share an uncontrollable electric connection. But will the bizarre dreams that haunt them both make this sexy yuletide encounter their last...or is it only the beginning?
author: Lacey Alexander
